personalInfo.clubAffl: Southern Highlands Golf Club (Las Vegas, Nevada)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T106 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Finished T3 at the 2009 Callaway Junior World Golf Championships against an outstanding international field on a U.S. Open venue, Torrey Pines (South Course)...Was the Northern California Player of the Year for JGANC in 2009 and was on the Junior America's Cup team in 2009 and 2010...He was also on the Hogan Cup team those years...Named to the Acacemic All-MW team three consecutive years at UNLV...Recorded three top 10s and a top-5 finish as a sophomore in 2012-13...Earned his first career individual title as a junior at the Jackrabbit Invitational, with a team-season-low 54-hole total of 7-under 209...Led the team in scoring average with 72.59...Earned All-Mountain West and PING All-West Region honors.
tourBios.personal: Attended Chico High School in Chico, Calif...Older brother, Daniel, played golf two years at Hawaii-Hilo...First hole-in-one was on a par 4, the 16th hole at Southern Highlands Golf Club...Lists "Entourage" and "Billy Madison" as his favorite movies...Eats candy the night before every round as a superstition...Not many people know that he played basketball in high school...Would trade places with Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson for a day because he is a very successful man and an incredibly hard worker.
